mapper.sql: id, user_id, product_id, order_detail_id, task_line_id, user_task_line_id, bonus_type, bonus_amount, create_time, update_time, remark, status

mapper.update:
update s_user_bonus_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_line_id = #{taskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_task_line_id = #{userTaskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bonus_type = #{bonusType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bonus_amount = #{bonusAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{logStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update s_user_bonus_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_line_id = #{taskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_task_line_id = #{userTaskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bonus_type = #{bonusType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bonus_amount = #{bonusAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{logStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select bonus_amount from s_user_bonus_log where user_task_line_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bonus_type = 2 and status = 0
select sum(bonus_amount) from s_user_bonus_log where user_task_line_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (bonus_type = 3 or bonus_type = 4) and status = 0

select
from s_user_bonus_log where order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bonus_type in (1,2,3,4) order by user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into s_user_bonus_log (id, user_id, product_id, order_detail_id, task_line_id, user_task_line_id, bonus_type, bonus_amount, create_time, update_time, remark, status) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userTaskLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bonusType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.bonusAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.logStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select count(id) from s_user_bonus_log where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (bonus_type = 2 or bonus_type = 3 or bonus_type = 4) and status = 1
